author: RDIL
body:
<!-- Anything that looks like this is a comment and can't be seen after the Pull Request is created. -->

# PR Summary

Now, dependabot-preview will stop, and dependabot will start issuing updates, since its now built into GitHub directly.

## PR Context

Dependabot has been merged into GitHub

## PR Checklist

- Not really code change

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
This pull request has been automatically marked as Review Needed because it has been there has not been any activity for **7 days**.
Maintainer, please provide feedback and/or mark it as `Waiting on Author`

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
:tada:`v7.1.0-preview.6` has been released which incorporates this pull request.:tada:

* [Release Notes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v7.1.0-preview.6)

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: @RDIL We still appear to be using dependabot-preview, rather than the built-in dependabot, for example see #14310.

title: Update the dependabot config to v2
